report.title: Get PoMS projects for country
report.description: Get a list of projects for a country code or ID. Returns all projects if country filter is empty.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_termlists_terms ctt JOIN termlists_term_attribute_values ttav_country ON ttav_country.termlists_term_id = ctt.id AND ttav_country.termlists_term_attribute_id = #country_for_project_tt_attribute_id# AND ttav_country.deleted = false JOIN indicia.cache_termlists_terms country_linked ON country_linked.id = ttav_country.int_value AND country_linked.termlist_id = #countries_termlist_id# JOIN indicia.cache_termlists_terms country_name ON country_name.meaning_id = country_linked.meaning_id AND country_name.preferred = true AND country_name.termlist_id = #countries_termlist_id# JOIN indicia.cache_termlists_terms country_code ON country_code.meaning_id = country_linked.meaning_id AND country_code.preferred = false AND country_code.termlist_id = #countries_termlist_id# LEFT JOIN termlists_term_attribute_values ttav_url ON ttav_url.termlists_term_id = ctt.id AND ttav_url.termlists_term_attribute_id = #url_for_project_tt_attribute_id# AND ttav_url.deleted = false WHERE ctt.termlist_id = #projects_termlist_id#

param.name: country_id
param.display: Country id to get projects for

param.name: country_code
param.display: Country code to get projects for

param.name: country_for_project_tt_attribute_id
param.display: Termlists term attribute ID that holds a project country

param.name: url_for_project_tt_attribute_id
param.display: Termlists term attribute ID that holds a project website URL
